variable.name: EVENT
variable.description: EVENT NUMBER ON SEQUENCE OF EVENTS
variable.value: MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION RECOGNIZED, WITH DIAGNOSTIC ECG
DEFINITE CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT AT EXAM 1, BUT QUESTIONABLE TYPE.
ATHEROTHROMBOTIC INFARCTION
TRANSIENT ISCHEMIC ATTACK (ONLY THE 1ST TRANSIENT ISCHEMIC ATTACK IS CODED)
CEREBRAL EMBOLISM
INTRACEREBRAL HEMORRHAGE
SUBARACHNOID HEMORRHAGE
OTHER CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT
QUESTIONABLE CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT AT EXAM 1, DATE OF EXAM 1
MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION RECOGNIZED, WITHOUT DIAGNOSTIC ECG, WITH TRANSAMINASE AND HISTORY
DEATH, CORONARY HEART DISEASE SUDDEN, WITHIN 1 HOUR
DEATH, CORONARY HEART DISEASE, 1-23 HOURS, NONSUDDEN
DEATH, CORONARY HEART DISEASE, 24-47 HOURS, NONSUDDEN
DEATH, CORONARY HEART DISEASE, 48 HOURS OR MORE, NONSUDDEN
DEATH, CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT
DEATH, OTHER CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASE
DEATH, CANCER
DEATH, OTHER CAUSES
DEATH, CAUSE UNKNOWN
MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION RECOGNIZED, WITHOUT DIAGNOSTIC ECG, WITH AUTOPSY EVIDENCE, NEW EVENT (SEE ALSO CODE 09)
INTERMITTANT CLAUDICATION, DATE MIDPOINT OF INTERVAL AS ANGINA PECTORIS, ALSO DATE ONLY FIRST EVENT
QUESTIONABLE INTERMITTANT CLAUDICATION AT EXAM 1, USE EXAM 1 DATE
MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION UNRECOGNIZED, SILENT
CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE NOT HOSPITALIZED
CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE HOSPITALIZED
QUESTIONABLE CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE AT EXAM 1, USE EXAM 1 DATE
MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION UNRECOGNIZED, NOT SILENT

ANGINA PECTORIS, FIRST EPISODE DATED ONLY. DATE AS MIDPOINT OF INTERVAL BETWEEN EXAMS OR BETWEEN HOSPITALIZATION AND EXAM. IF ANGINA PECTORIS OCCURRED WITH MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION OR CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY, THEN USE SAME DATE AS MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION OR CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY. UNTIL 1987, IF ANGINA PECTORIS OCCURRED JUST BEFORE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION OR CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY, THEN DATE 3 MONTHS BEFORE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION OR CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY. IF ANGINA PECTORIS OCCURRED JUST AFTER MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION OR CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY, THEN DATE 3 MONTHS AFTER MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION OR CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY. BEGINNING IN 1987, IF INFORMATION ON THE DATE OF NEW ANGINA WAS AVAILABLE, THEN AN A DATE WAS ASSIGNED, EITHER APPROXIMATE OR EXACT, IF KNOWN.
CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY, BOTH ECG AND HISTORY DEFINITE

QUESTIONABLE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION AT EXAM 1, DATE SAME DATE AS EXAM 1. ANY QUESTIONABLE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION EPISODE AT EXAM 1: DEFINITE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION HISTORY WITHOUT TRANSAMINASE OR AUTOPSY, OR POSSIBLE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION-ECG. DOES NOT INCLUDE QUESTIONABLE ANGINA PECTORIS.
MI AUTOPSY, NOT A NEW EVENT. THIS IS SAME EVENT AS A PREVIOUSLY CODED MI (01-02).

variable.name: EVTIME
variable.description: TIME FROM EXAM 1 TO DATE OF EVENT IN DAYS

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.value: ORIGINAL COHORT GROUP
OFFSPRING GROUP
GENERATION 3
